BadgeDetail.Name: Feedback
BadgeDetail.Description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated they are able to use feedback to improve. During induction they have demonstrated they actively read comments on their work and can then explain what they need to do to improve.

Task.Title: Feedback
Task.Body: Describe a recent situation where you received constructive feedback. What was the feedback and what did you decide you needed to do to improve?
Task.HtmlBody: Describe a recent situation where you received constructive feedback. What was the feedback and what did you decide you needed to do to improve?
Task.TextileBody: Describe a recent situation where you received constructive feedback. What was the feedback and what did you decide you needed to do to improve?
